title: U.S. Engagment Against ISIS Can't Be Timid, Retired Marine General Says
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to retired Marine General Gregory Newbold about what the U.S. is doing right, or wrong, in its efforts to militarily contain the so-called Islamic State, also known as ISIS.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
